about_the_game:
Your Ultimate AI Playground

Step into a world where technology meets humanity with Digital Humans, the cutting-edge experience that redefines your interaction with AI. Imagine a digital being that listens, understands, and responds to you in real-time.

Why Early Access?

Early Access offers us the unique opportunity to further develop and improve Digital Humans together with an engaged community. Your feedback is crucial to optimize the performance and usability of our AI characters. Together, we can create an impressive and innovative solution that does not require constant internet access or subscriptions.

Current Status of the Early Access Version

First Characters: Kayla and Alfred

Our first characters, Kayla and Alfred, are fully available to you. Designed for natural and realistic interactions, Kayla showcases our advancements in digital human simulation. Alfred, on the other hand, is a hyper-intelligent, interdimensional being inexplicably trapped in your computer. Cynical and focused on humanity’s shortcomings, Alfred is not for the easily offended.

Full Voice Input and Output

Kayla and Alfred support both voice input and voice output, making communication effortless and immersive. Speak directly to Kayla or Alfred, and they will respond accordingly, creating a seamless and natural experience.

Chat Interface
In addition to voice communication, the current version also offers a chat interface for those who prefer a text-based interaction.

Key Features:

A Snapshot of Humanity
Imagine the large language model driving our Digital Humans as a save point of the human condition at a specific moment, ready to be explored through engaging interactions.

Engaging and Educational
While it won’t do your homework and may struggle with math, it opens a world of AI exploration that’s both fun and enlightening.

Human-Like Behavior
Like a digital mirror, your digital human reflects human nuances and imperfections. It may hallucinate and provide incorrect information—just like a real human!—making interactions feel natural and authentic.

Voice-Driven
Speak and be heard. Your digital human interacts with you entirely by voice.

No Subscription, No Limits
Use Digital Humans as much as you want—no subscriptions, no limits. Enjoy unrestricted access to your digital companions anytime.

Offline and Private
Seamless, lifelike conversations anytime, anywhere. Your data is securely stored on your device, ensuring absolute privacy.

Transparent AI Design
Each character’s personality is clear and intentional, offering open, authentic interactions without hidden agendas. Conversations respect user autonomy while providing diverse perspectives, from friendly to critical.

Planned Improvements and Features for the Full Version

Our goal for the full version is to conquer the uncanny valley in real-time, delivering uncreepy, natural characters that laugh, smirk, or roll their eyes. This will offer the ultimate 21st-century puppet mastery.

Character and Persona Editor

We plan five curated charcters (one of them voted by the community) and a comprehensive editor, that allows users to create unique digital characters with detailed customization options.

Advanced Features and Functions

Enhanced voice interaction capabilities and additional features that expand the boundaries of digital human interaction.

Long-Term Memory

If you choose, your Digital Human can learn from past interactions and develop long-term memory, evolving based on your preferences and interactions over time.

Major Language Support

Interact in your preferred language or even use the AI as a translator, enhancing accessibility and usability.

Early Access Phase Until 2026

We plan to keep “Digital Humans” in Early Access until 2026. This extended period will allow us to refine and optimize every aspect of the platform, incorporating valuable user feedback along the way. Expect frequent updates and improvements during this time to create the best possible experience.

Your Support is Crucial!

Your feedback and support are essential to the success of this project. Together, we can make Digital Humans an indispensable tool for natural and intuitive interactions with AI. Thank you for joining and supporting us on this exciting journey!

Digital Humans is more than just a tool: it’s your AI playground and assistant, guiding you through the future of digital interaction. Though Digital Humans suck at math, they are the ultimate brain extension since the invention of the calculator! (*calculator not included)

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7-8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080

  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics VRAM minimum 8 GB

  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 3900X / Intel Core i9-9900K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics VRAM minimum 8 GB
